EmailTemplate.subject: Your All-In-One Solution For Flight Planning
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
{{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, have you heard?
Honeywell Aerospace’s Flight Planning software is the best way to save time and improve efficiency when flight planning, even on international flights. Plus, Honeywell is the first and only provider <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/GHI0XX200q0aQ0Gq00000Z0]]> to integrate flight planning with multiple flight scheduling software systems. I’m here to answer all your questions and help you make an informed decision. Are you free for a brief call this week or next?
Regina Warnke Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: (319) 573-9710 Email: regina.warnke@honeywell.com <[[mailto:regina.warnke@honeywell.com]]> GoDirectSales@honeywell.com <[[mailto:GoDirectSales@honeywell.com]]>
